title: "Today We're Playing 'My Friend Eric!'" - A Brand New Segment!
itunes:title: "Today We're Playing 'My Friend Eric!'" - A Brand New Segment!
description:
Jeremy and Unati have 30 minutes to build a world and a PC before Jeremy DMs an improvised D&D session for Unati using the character and world they just created! X-Men references and knives abound as we debut a new segment that asks, "who says you need hours of prep to create a fun setting or a cool character?" (It's so new we don't even have a name for it yet!)

If you enjoy this podcast please help us out by leaving a review and sharing it with your fellow adventurers

Want more 3BH in your life? You can now buy merchandise here! .

Support us on Patreon at patreon.com/tbhalflings for your Shirefolk Shoutout and Bonus Episodes including Campfire Chats where we dive into each episode of Outlaws & Obelisks.

Connect with us on Twitter, Instagram, and Facebook @tbhalflings, on our Discord, or email secondbreakfast@tbhalflings.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
